plot PE catch estimates by catch group (est_cg), period (time stratum) and section

prep_days()
Title
prep_dwg_census_expan()
creates summary table of census expansion factors based on values in data base
prep_dwg_effort_census()
Aggregate census (tie in) effort counts, associating to closest-in-time index count.
prep_dwg_effort_index()
Aggregates index effort counts over locations within count_seq & section based on study_design and user input values for boat_type_collapse, fish_location_determines_type, angler_type_kayak_pontoon
prep_dwg_interview_angler_types()
Create angler_final field based on study_design designation and user input values for boat_type_collapse, fish_location_determines_type, angler_type_kayak_pontoon
prep_dwg_interview_fishing_time()
title
prep_export()

prep_inputs_bss()
Create object/list of data inputs for BSS model
prep_inputs_pe_ang_hrs()
Title
prep_inputs_pe_daily_cpue_catch_est()
Calculate daily cpue by section, date (period, day_type), angler_final, and catch group (aka est_cg) using the Ratio-of-Means (rom) calculation
prep_inputs_pe_days_total()
Calculate total days the fishery was open per strata (strata = period, day_type, and section_num)
prep_inputs_pe_df()
Calculate degrees of freedom based on number of creel survey days
prep_inputs_pe_int_ang_per_object()
calculate the number of objects (e.g., trailers, vehicles, boats) each angler group brought to the fishery based on study_design used
prep_inputs_pe_paired_census_index_counts()
Summarize paired census and index angler effort counts
